channel.title: Noob question (I hardly know java)
channel.description: I've read through some of the post on these forums, and apparently you have to compile the client.java file to update your server if you change the coding in that file (please correct me if I am wrong). How do I do that exactly? Please don't give me links to the java.com tutorials because I don't get it.

item.title: Noob question (I hardly know java)
item.dc:creator: @firedude076 firedude076
item.description:
@firedude076 wrote:

Go to the link that has Mod Tahorak’s compiler and do as it says. Then all you have to do is compile every time you edit something in the cilent.java.

Read full topic
